description: This file provides utility functions for loading data from and saving data to the browser's localStorage, handling JSON serialization and error cases.

methods.name: export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T { loadFromStorage
methods.description: Retrieves an item from localStorage by key, parses it as JSON, and returns it, or returns a fallback value if retrieval or parsing fails.

methods.name: export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void { saveToStorage
methods.description: Stringifies a value as JSON and stores it in localStorage under the specified key, ignoring errors.

ctags.name: loadFromStorage
ctags.pattern: /^export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T {$/

ctags.name: saveToStorage
ctags.pattern: /^export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void {$/
